name: Garden Time
description:
Garden Time is the relaxing first person gardening simulation you've been waiting for! Make your dream garden, today. And tomorrow. And the next day. And the day after that...

Features

  • Full day/night cycle
  • Various plants and decoration
  • Three thrilling garden tools
  • Shopping
  • Physics

Tools

  • Unity (with DOTween and Amplify Shader)
  • Blender
  • Photoshop
  • Audacity

Made over 48 hours for the October 2020 Ludum Dare game jam.
